page.title: 10SECONDARY SCHOOL SURVEY
page.content: OVER 80% OF ALL CHILDREN BETWEEN THE AGES OF 11 AND 16 IN OUR AREA ATTEND A SECONDARY MODERN SCHOOL.AS AN EXAMPLE OF THIS TYPE OF SCHOOL WE LOOKED AT BEVERLEY BOYS SCHOOL. IN THE FIRST THREE YEARS AT BEVERLEY PUPILS TAKE A BROADLY BASED CURRICULUM TO ALLOW THEM TO CHOOSE "OPTION" SUBJECTS AT THE END OF THE THIRD YEAR. MOST PUPILS THEN CONCENTRATE ON EIGHT SUBJECTS WHICH MUST INCLUDE ENGLISH AND MATHEMATICS.IN MOST CASES THESE COURSES LEAD TO PUBLIC EXAMINATIONS AT C.S.E. OR G.C.E."O" LEVEL.THESE EXAMINATIONS TAKE PLACE AT THE END OF THE FIFTH YEAR AFTER WHICH MOST STUDENTS LEAVE SCHOOL. SOME STUDENTS THEN RETURN TO SCHOOL TO FOLLOW ONE OR TWO YEAR COURSES IN THE SIXTH FORM.
